long_description:
The ClayCrafter mod adds a way for players to obtain clay other than mining, out of a common material: dirt. It adds three new nodes:

Claycrafter: Used to convert compressed dirt into clay.

Compressed dirt: Just 9 dirt, compressed, useful for saving storage space, too!

Glass of water: Used as fuel for the Claycrafter. Placeable.

Supports moreblocks' compressed dirt.
name: claycrafter
short_description: Introduces the Claycrafter, which converts Compressed Dirt to Clay using Glasses of Water.
title: Claycrafter
